short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ayah is an Islamic new tab extension that allows you to copy a verse of the Qur'an to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ayah is an Islamic Chrome extension that allows you to copy a verse of the Qur'an to your clipboard. With a simple click, Ayah allows users to quickly find, copy, and paste verses from the Qur'an along with their translations.

This tool is invaluable for anyone needing to reference specific passages for contemplation, academic research, or khutbahs.

Ayah utilizes the Dr. Mustafa Khattab translation of the Clear Qur'an by default, known for its clarity and accessibility. Users can also select alternative translations in the Options panel.
